description: Try our easy to follow Diy Chutney Kit recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chutney,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Tomato,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Diy Chutney Kit Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using a small sharp knife, make a cut in the skin of each tomato and place in a bowl. Cover with boiling water and set aside for 5 minutes.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add onion, pickling spice and garlic and cook, stirring frequently, for 5 minutes or until onion has softened. Stir in remaining spices and cook for 1 minute.

Drain tomatoes, remove skin and chop. Add to pan with vinegar and sugar, increase heat and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 11/2 hours or until thick. Transfer to clean, dry jars. Seal and label. Note: This chutney can be kept in the pantry for about 6 weeks. Once opened, store in the fridge.
